name: inazone-api-automation
description: INA Zone API automation using Mocha Chai. This project is a part of the [INA ZONE API](https://github.com/indahmutiah/ina-zone) project.

scripts.test-inazone: mocha test-inazone.spec.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=reports,reportFilename=Report INA ZONE API Automation

author: Indah Mutiah MZ
